data.description: Module for creating fake objects for tests
data.communities: perl-qa mailing list, my use.perl journal
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is built on Test::Builder, and uses a test pattern
    called 'Mock Objects' (http://www.mockobjects.com/). This does very
    little a clever hacker could not do manually, but it is
    encapsulated, abstracted, and integrated. The combination will,
    hopefully, make it easier for the average hacker.
